org.apache.flink.storm.api.FlinkTopology

  • 使用FlinkTopology的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.flink.storm.api  

    • org.apache.flink.storm.api中FlinkTopology的使用

      返回FlinkTopology的org.apache.flink.storm.api中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static FlinkTopology FlinkTopology.createTopology(backtype.storm.topology.TopologyBuilder stormBuilder)
      Creates a Flink program that uses the specified spouts and bolts.
      参数类型为FlinkTopology的org.apache.flink.storm.api中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void FlinkSubmitter.submitTopology(String name, Map<?,?> stormConf, FlinkTopology topology, backtype.storm.generated.SubmitOptions opts)
      Submits a topology to run on the cluster.
      static void FlinkSubmitter.submitTopology(String name, Map stormConf, FlinkTopology topology)
      Submits a topology to run on the cluster.
      void FlinkLocalCluster.submitTopology(String topologyName, Map conf, FlinkTopology topology) 
      void FlinkClient.submitTopology(String name, String uploadedJarLocation, FlinkTopology topology)
      Parameter uploadedJarLocation is actually used to point to the local jar, because Flink does not support uploading a jar file before hand.
      void FlinkLocalCluster.submitTopologyWithOpts(String topologyName, Map conf, FlinkTopology topology, backtype.storm.generated.SubmitOptions submitOpts) 
      void FlinkClient.submitTopologyWithOpts(String name, String uploadedJarLocation, FlinkTopology topology)
      Parameter uploadedJarLocation is actually used to point to the local jar, because Flink does not support uploading a jar file before hand.
      static void FlinkSubmitter.submitTopologyWithProgressBar(String name, Map<?,?> stormConf, FlinkTopology topology)
      Same as FlinkSubmitter.submitTopology(String, Map, FlinkTopology, SubmitOptions).
